Parameter.Name: DatesetName
Parameter.Value: ServiceFabricIoTDS [[You don't need to change this name, if you do please modify the Dataschema.json file as well]]

Parameter.Name: TableName
Parameter.Value: ServiceFabricIOTTable [[You don't need to change this name, if you do please modify the Dataschema.json file as well]]

Parameter.Name: ClientId
Parameter.Value: [[Native application registered with Azure A/D where Power BI is provisioned, application is given permission via permisson to other applications]]

Parameter.Name: Username
Parameter.Value: [[User allowed to PowerBI in form of XX@xxx.com or xx@xx.onmicrosoft.com - part of your A/D tenant - MSA will not work]]

Parameter.Name: PowerBIBaseUrl
Parameter.Value: https://api.powerbi.com/v1.0/myorg/datasets/ [[change if you are using groups datasets]]
